level.text: Any combination of art therapies services shall be limited to a maximum of two thousand, two hundred and fifty dollars ($2,250.00) per person, per ISP year and delivered in accordance with the person’s ISP and Plan of Care.
The reimbursement rate for art therapies services shall be:
Forty-five dollars ($45.00) per hour for art therapy;
Forty-five dollars ($45.00) per hour for dance therapy;
Forty-five dollars ($45.00) per hour for drama therapy; and
Forty-five dollars ($45.00) per hour for music therapy.

The billable unit of service for art therapies services shall be fifteen (15) minutes. A provider shall provide at least eight (8) minutes of service in a span of fifteen (15) continuous minutes to bill a unit of service.
